title: The Adamantine Forge
content:
cale Mail Adamantine Shield Adamantine Longsword Adamantine Scimitar Adamantine Mace

There exists a bug where the forge crucible can no longer be interactable. This can happen if you remove the forged item during the fight with Grym. There's a bug where the lava won't flow away again, preventing the platform from being raised. This is easily resolved by going into turn-based mode and skipping a few turns.
